content: Guangmou is one of the more tricky fights you’ll have faced so far, relying on a variety of sneaky projectile attacks to keep you on the defensive and limit your ability to pursue him. Though he’s not technically a snake, you will find yourself in danger of being poisoned during this fight, so you may want to buy a few anti-poison medicine from the Shrine’s shop.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Guangmou.md', within the main section titled 'Guangmou', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Guangmou' and the sub-subsection 'Guangmou Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Guangmou is one of the more tricky fights you’ll have faced so far, relying on a variety of sneaky projectile attacks to keep you on the defensive and limit your ability to pursue him. Though he’s not technically a snake, you will find yourself in danger of being poisoned during this fight, so you may want to buy a few anti-poison medicine from the Shrine’s shop.
